title: Laying it Bare in Pre-Med
description: Toby Matthews and Melody Winters met through their roommates and it was love and lust at first sight. In only a short amount of time their relationship bloomed into something perfect. However, when the demands of Toby finishing up his medical schooling begin interfering with their time together, will they be able to keep the fire burning or will his responsibilities snuff out their love? Especially when another medical student sets her sights on Toby?
author: L.E. Martin
